original_title: The Situation: Two Years of Life and Death in a Town in El Salvador
overview: A frightening portrait of two years in the hell of El Salvador's civil war. The death squads...CIA intrigues at the Ramada Inn...rouge military officers...bombing civilians to save them and a press corps tucked away in the capital, 3 hours away from the war.
title: The Situation: Two Years of Life and Death in a Town in El Salvador
